amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Corps of Engineers Construction by $500,000 and reduces funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Corps of Engineers Construction (CAP) by $500,000 and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Walorski.
